original: Bodewall, Karl Gustav Ino, hovrätt|sassessor, Ronneby, numera Stockholm, f. 3/6/06 i Kardshamn av konsul Carl E. Niilsison o-. Gerda Nils’Son. G. 39 m. Margit Lindström. Barn: Canla f. 42, Aisa 43. — Jur. kand. i Lund 31, Tingstjg. i Rönnebergs, Onsjö o. Har-jagers dom<s. 31-34, tf. fitsikal i hovr. över Skåne o. Blek. 35, tf. stadsnot. o. rådman i Landskrona 36, sekr. i Östra o. Medclista doms. 37-39 samt i Oxie o. Skytts doms. 40-41, fiskal v. hovr. över Skåne o. Blek. 43, adj. led. 43, assessor 45, tf. itingsdomare i Ö’S:tra o. Medelsta domsL 45-46, tf. rev:sekr. 47. *Bodm, Henrik, kyrkoherde, Stora Mellby, f. 31/5/97 i Borås. — Stud:ex. i Borås 18, fil. kand. 24, teol. kand. 28, prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. f. Skara stift 29. Tjg. s. past:adj. o. v. pastor i Tidaholm, Götene, Finnerödja o. Habo, kommin. i Stora Mellby 33, kyrkoh. där sed. 45 (tilltr. 46).
translated:
Bodewall, Karl Gustav Ino was born on June 3rd, 1906 in Kardshamn to consul Carl E. Niilsison and Gerda Nils’Son. He became a Jur. kand. at Lund University in 1931 and served as Tingstjg. in Rönnebergs, Onsjö and Har-jagers dom<s from 1931 to 1934, as well as temporary fitsikal in hovr. över Skåne o. Blek. in 1935. Additionally, he also worked as temporary stadsnot. o. rådman in Landskrona in 1936, secretary in Östra o. Medclista doms. from 1937 to 1939, and in Oxie o. Skytts doms. from 1940 to 1941. In 1943, he became fiskal v. hovr. över Skåne o. Blek., and then an adj. led. in the same year. Later, he became an assessor in 1945 and served as temporary itingsdomare in Ö’S:tra o. Medelsta domsL. from 1945 to 1946, and temporary rev.sekr. in 1947. Karl was married to Margit Lindström in 1939 and they had two children, Canla who was born in 1942 and Aisa who was born in 1943.

Bodewall's father was Henrik Bodewall, a pastor from Stora Mellby. Henrik was born on May 31st, 1897 in Borås. He graduated from Stud:ex. in Borås in 1918, became a fil. kand. in 1924, and a teol. kand. in 1928. He passed his practical teol. prov and was ordained a priest for the Skara stift in 1929. Henrik then served as past:adj. and v. pastor in Tidaholm, Götene, Finnerödja, and Habo, before becoming a kommin. in Stora Mellby in 1933. He continued to serve there until he became the kyrkoh. (church minister) in 1945, starting that position in 1946.
